summary:
This mod adds to the world of Skyrim a version inspired on
the wizard Sarumans Tower Orthanc from the lotr lore.
descriptionHtml:
INTRODUCTION:

This mod adds to the world of Skyrim a version inspired on
the wizard Sarumans Tower Orthanc from the lotr lore.

FEATURES:

The Tower has severall divisions; all of them with navmesh
; various npc\'s that have their own AI Packages, including
of course the Wizard Saruman, is bodyguard the Uruk Hai 
Lurtz and a very old friend trapped at the top of the tower.

INSTALLING:

Installing this mod is very easy; just paste the data 
folder with the mod files in your Skyrim folder and then
check if the SarumansTower.esp file is selected in your
data files menu or mod mannager.

IMPORTANT:

For this mod you must have the Dawnguard DLC.

PS: 

Don\'t forget to give feedback on the mod; and if you 
really liked it don\'t forget to endorse.
author: Sergeynest
